channel.title: 317 Rune4Ever Beta (Oldskool)
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt]Rune4Ever[/size] Oldskool Server [size=24pt][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?07up6zdud40iuq8]Download[/url] [url=http://z13.invisionfree.com/Rune4Ever/index.php?]Forums[/url][/size]
This is a truly oldskool server. We are a brand new server in need of players to test our content. We want players to have fun, but we also want some challenge. If you want to pk, stake, or just kill monsters, we have that. We plan to add more content after we get feedback, we don't want too much content on day one or else we won't get proper feedback on everything. Don't come here expecting everything to be done, we're not even close.
Our main focus right now is combat. We don't have all the skills completed yet, but there are some for those who want to train them. We plan on finish slayer first, then we'll decide if we need anymore skills.
[ul][li]Sounds[/li] [li]NPC Clipping[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]317 Interfaces[/li] [li]317 Animations[/li] [li]317 Models[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Thieving[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/1NPCclipping.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/2Staking.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/3Winning.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/4Specs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/5Slayer.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: 317 Rune4Ever Beta (Oldskool)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

don’t be so hypocritical, we’ve all done it a point in time.

No, not all of us have. Not me.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Rune4Ever Beta (Oldskool)
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:7, topic:447905”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=550794.msg4037021#msg4037021 date=1341282185]

The fact that you said Oldskool made me not want to join tbh

This, that is rather so damn unprofessional, anyway, good luck nonetheless.

How is the spelling of ‘Skool’ unprofessional in anyway, shape or form? It’s an acronym for School.

Looks nice OP. Good luck
[/quote]

[quote=Dictionary.com]
Acronym n. a word formed from the initial letters or groups of letters of words in a set phrase or series of words, as Wac from Women’s Army Corps, OPEC from Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries, or loran from long-range navigation.[/quote]

What the fuck have you been smoking? Also, “skool” is not an actual word. It’s an unprofessional and lazy version of the word “school”.[/quote]

The same shit you have.
http://www.internetslang.com/SKOOL-meaning-definition.asp
It’s internet slang, although I admit it was my fault I used acronym in the wrong context. Who cares if it’s ‘lazy’ or unprofessional, we’re not running a corporate businesses. It’s a fucking private server, what has anybody got to lose by using internet slang, don’t be so hypocritical, we’ve all done it a point in time.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Rune4Ever Beta (Oldskool)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:4, topic:447905”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=550794.msg4037005#msg4037005 date=1341281605]

The fact that you said Oldskool made me not want to join tbh

This, that is rather so damn unprofessional, anyway, good luck nonetheless.
[/quote]

How is the spelling of ‘Skool’ unprofessional in anyway, shape or form? It’s an acronym for School.

Looks nice OP. Good luck :)[/quote]

Acronym [i]n.[/i] a word formed from the initial letters or groups of letters of words in a set phrase or series of words, as Wac from Women's Army Corps, OPEC from Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries, or loran from long-range navigation.

What the fuck have you been smoking? Also, “skool” is not an actual word. It’s an unprofessional and lazy version of the word “school”.

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote]

How is the spelling of ‘Skool’ unprofessional in anyway, shape or form? It’s an acronym for School.

Looks nice OP. Good luck :)[/quote]
Yes, I know dear Adam, however, I don’t think I would put ‘Skool’ on an advertisement thread under the header if I’m attempting to professional. Based upon how he expresses the server in such a manner makes me believe he wants to be.

Read full topic
